work-item.field: Perform the Feasibility Study and document the results.

You should perform a Feasibility Study and document the results in the . if you have already performed this analysis, you can import the results from an existing Word document, either replacing the existing Feasibility Study document, or creating a new one in the Concept space by using a different name when you import.Â Remember to link the document on the Concept page if you import it with different name.
